page.title: 11Games/Gt.Waldingfield
page.content: STUCK IN THE MUD. You need at least 6 people.Someone is chosen as Â£it'and has to run around to try to catch the other people.The corners of the playground are called Â£home'and you cannot be caught in them.If you are caught you have to stand still with your arms out.Someone who has not been caught can free you by touching you.The game goes on until there is just one person left.That person becomes Â£it' and the game starts again. LEAP FROG. You need two or more players.One player stands holding his/her ankles with his/her head tucked in.One at a time the other players jump over him/her by running up and putting their hands on his/her back and jumping.
